title: Oxidative cleavage of β-O-4 bonds in lignin model compounds with polymer-supported Ni–Salen catalysts
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00331D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Qiongli Liu, Dianyong Yang, Xiuge Zhao, Zhiwei Xu, Ji Ding, Danqi Wu, Ning An, Huiying Liao, Zhenshan Hou
The polymerized Salen-Ni(II) complex can catalyze oxidative cleavage of the lignin model compounds into high-value aromatic chemicals without any base additive.
